attributes.action: Hypothecate all motoring taxes for spending only on roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Motoring taxes (VED, fuel tax and duty, new car taxes etc etc) are currently estimated to raise approximately £50bn pa. Of this less than £6bn is actually spent on roads. Instead of treating the motorist as a cash cow, EITHER all motoring taxes should be spent on improved/new/better maintained roads OR motoring taxes should be reduced to the actual level of expenditure on the road network.
